title: Examination by medical officer
context: ยง353-13 Examination by medical officer. The medical officer of a correctional facility shall carefully examine any committed person upon admission and shall establish a medical record and enter therein a statement of the committed person&rsquo;s physical condition upon entry and all subsequent medical treatment and examination made while such person is residing at a state correctional facility. [L 1987, c 338, pt of ยง3]
